articles.title: Polls show Americans largely oppose Trump's 'One Big Beautiful Bill,' but are more split on Medicaid, immigration specifics - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
Poll: Most feel democracy is threatened and political violence is a major problem - NPR
articles.description: 76% of Americans think that democracy is under a serious threat, according to the latest NPR/PBS News/Marist poll. And their faith in political leadership in the White House and Congress is low.
articles.content:
Ahead of the July Fourth holiday and the country's 249th birthday, three-quarters of Americans say democracy is under serious threat, according to a new NPR/PBS News/Marist poll.

articles.title: North Korean operatives and American accomplices accused in massive fraud that infiltrated the Fortune 500 and stole millions - Fortune
articles.description: The Justice Department, in a series of indictments, has laid out the use of front companies as a way to further the North Korean IT worker scheme.
